Name: Hop Toad #3
Ingredients: 45 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Fresh apricot dessert - all it lacks is a dollop of whipped cream.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Hop Toad #3 contains 101 calories
